data.meta_description: Contact Barbara Robinson, author of witchy paranormal romances featuring love and magic in historical and contemporary settings. Questions, feedback and reader suggestions are always welcome.
data.meta_site_name: BJR Books - Romance That Enchants & Inspires
data.text:
Thank you for signing up. I hope that you enjoy my content, and I would love to hear from you.

If you have comments and feedback, or ideas for topics you would like to explore in future issues, please send me a message via my Contact page.
